name: Intro
journal: I can remember what I can do by typing 'help commands'. I need to use 'map' to see where I am.

params: I can always remember the commands by typing 'help commands'. I should familiarize myself with some basic commands. I'll start by typing 'map' to see where I am.

name: Intro Map
journal: I should travel to Farmer's Hut.

params: I should travel to the Farmer's Hut. I can do so by typing 'travel farmer's hut'.

name: Travel again
journal: I should continue traveling to the interior of Farmer's Hut

params: Now I should travel to the Farmer's Hut Interior. I can do so by typing the shortcuts 't interior'.

name: Arrive Interior
journal: I should read the Apple Pie Recipe

params: I should use the 'look' command to see what surrounds me.

name: Intro Look
journal: I should read the recipe for Apple Pie.

params: I should read the recipe for Apple Pie.

name: Read Recipe
journal: I can do the new quest or I can continue travelling to Barren Field.

params: I can do the new quest or I can continue travelling to Barren Field.

name: Complete
journal: I now have a basic knowledge of how I can explore this world.

params: Now that I've completed these tasks I feel ready to explore the world.
